!important;}”]

Mersinlik, North Cyrus

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”One of the fırst settlements in the world” font_container=”tag:h5|font_size:20px|text_align:left|line_height:2em” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”none”][vc_custom_heading text=”Located in Iskele, near the eastern slopes of Five Finger Mountains, you can find the panoramic Fflamoudi/Mersinlik village, six kilometers west of Kantara Castle. e. The local lime tree’s blossom, “Phlamoudhi“ has been suggested as the possible inspiration for the town’s name. In 1975, Turkish Cypriots gave the town its current name, Mersinlik, which means “place of myrsine trees“ in Turkish. According to the researchers, the mystery of the rapid relocation of the Phlamoudhi population 35 centuries ago has been partially solved. The enigma stays and you are welcome to walk through the trails of their former inhabitants.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:17px|text_align:left|line_height:2em” use_theme_fonts=”yes” What is Around

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Within a 60KM radius of the site, you’ll find an assortment of compelling attractions catering to a variety of interests. These range from the convenience of the airport and the charm of local towns, to historical treasures such as castles and ancient sites, as well as the allure of hiking hotspots. Nestled in the midst of unspoiled nature, the site also serves as a showcase for the authentic and local products of Cyprus, particularly the region’s esteemed olives and olive oil.” Historical Sightseeing

Explore the rich cultural heritage of the region through a journey of historical sightseeing, immersing yourself in tales and relics of the past.[/fancy_box][/item][item simple_slider_bg_image_position=”default” simple_slider_overlay_strength=”0.3″ simple_slider_bg_image_loading=”default” id=”1689449512916-5″ title=”Item” tab_id=”1689449512917-0″][fancy_box box_style=”hover_desc” icon_family=”iconsmind” image_url=”1012″ hover_color=”accent-color” hover_color_custom=”#0a0202″ hover_desc_color_opacity=”0.9″ hover_desc_hover_overlay_opacity=”0.4″ disable_hover_movement=”true” bg_parallax=”true” icon_position=”top” box_alignment=”left” hover_desc_bg_animation=”none” border_radius=”default” image_loading=”lazy-load” color_scheme=”dark” secondary_content=”here’s some awesome text that would only be shown on hover” min_height=”75vh” icon_iconsmind=”iconsmind-Aquarius” min_height_tablet=”550″]

Exploring Nature

Embark on an adventure amidst the captivating natural landscapes from idyllic beaches to vibrant flora, each a testament to the tranquil allure of the Mediterranean.[/fancy_box][/item][item simple_slider_bg_image_position=”default” simple_slider_overlay_strength=”0.3″ simple_slider_bg_image_loading=”default” id=”1689449512945-7″ title=”Item” tab_id=”1689449512946-1″][fancy_box box_style=”hover_desc” icon_family=”iconsmind” image_url=”561″ hover_color=”extra-color-1″ hover_color_custom=”#000000″ hover_desc_color_opacity=”0.9″ hover_desc_hover_overlay_opacity=”0.4″ disable_hover_movement=”true” bg_parallax=”true” icon_position=”top” box_alignment=”left” hover_desc_bg_animation=”none” border_radius=”default” image_loading=”lazy-load” color_scheme=”dark” secondary_content=”here’s some awesome text that would only be shown on hover” min_height=”75vh” icon_iconsmind=”iconsmind-Footprint” min_height_tablet=”550″]

Hiking

Embrace the great outdoors with a hiking expedition in the mountains near Kaia, where panoramic views reward your sense of adventure.[/fancy_box][/item][item simple_slider_bg_image_position=”default” simple_slider_overlay_strength=”0.3″ simple_slider_bg_image_loading=”default” id=”1689449512974-10″ title=”Item” tab_id=”1689449512974-6″][fancy_box box_style=”hover_desc” icon_family=”iconsmind” image_url=”1013″ hover_color=”accent-color” hover_color_custom=”#0a0202″ hover_desc_color_opacity=”0.9″ hover_desc_hover_overlay_opacity=”0.4″ disable_hover_movement=”true” bg_parallax=”true” icon_position=”top” box_alignment=”left” hover_desc_bg_animation=”none” border_radius=”default” image_loading=”lazy-load” color_scheme=”dark” secondary_content=”here’s some awesome text that would only be shown on hover” min_height=”75vh” icon_iconsmind=”iconsmind-Pisces-2″ min_height_tablet=”550″]

Sandy Beach Access

Embrace the serene beauty of Kaia’s adjacent sandy beach, where the flow of the waves invites you to relax and feel the Mediterranean sun.[/fancy_box][/item][item simple_slider_bg_image_position=”default” simple_slider_overlay_strength=”0.3″ simple_slider_bg_image_loading=”default” id=”1689449512994-1″ title=”Item” tab_id=”1689449512995-3″][fancy_box box_style=”hover_desc” icon_family=”iconsmind” image_url=”1017″ hover_color=”extra-color-1″ hover_color_custom=”#000000″ hover_desc_color_opacity=”0.9″ hover_desc_hover_overlay_opacity=”0.4″ disable_hover_movement=”true” bg_parallax=”true” icon_position=”top” box_alignment=”left” hover_desc_bg_animation=”none” border_radius=”default” image_loading=”lazy-load” color_scheme=”dark” secondary_content=”here’s some awesome text that would only be shown on hover” min_height=”75vh” icon_iconsmind=”iconsmind-Martini-Glass” min_height_tablet=”550″]

Night Out

With Kaia’s convenient pickup services, you can experience the bustling city’s nightlife, promising an evening full of entertainment and cultural exploration.[/fancy_box][/item][item simple_slider_bg_image_position=”default” simple_slider_overlay_strength=”0.3″ simple_slider_bg_image_loading=”default” id=”1689449513019-7″ title=”Item” tab_id=”1689449513020-1″][fancy_box box_style=”hover_desc” icon_family=”iconsmind” image_url=”557″ hover_color=”accent-color” hover_color_custom=”#0a0202″ hover_desc_color_opacity=”0.9″ hover_desc_hover_overlay_opacity=”0.4″ disable_hover_movement=”true” bg_parallax=”true” icon_position=”top” box_alignment=”left” hover_desc_bg_animation=”none” border_radius=”default” image_loading=”lazy-load” color_scheme=”dark” secondary_content=”here’s some awesome text that would only be shown on hover” min_height=”75vh” icon_iconsmind=”iconsmind-Turtle” min_height_tablet=”550″]

Turtle Hatching
